page.title: 05MOTHER & TODDLER CLUB
page.content: Therfield Mother & Toddler group is held weekly in the school hall.It is an opportunity for mothers with pre_school children in Therfield and the surrounding villages to meet outside their own homes.It also enables the children otherwise isolated from playmates of their own age to mix and develop their social skills.Holding the group in the school hall familiarises the children with the building and its surroundings, making starting school a less awe inspiring prospect.We cater for upwards of 25 children at present,with ages ranging from young babies through to 4 years old.
